name: DesigntipsfromSmith&Noble

Developer Terms of Use
des: Think of us like the design-knowledgeable best friend you love having over. We've got tips on everything from window treatments to using color to design approach to what to do with all the art your kids bring home! Ask Alexa for tips from our experienced designers and make your home more comfortable, peaceful and happy.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
